name: places/ChIJZ1hKOM1ZwokRDeQke2mpVM8
adrFormatAddress: 365 5th Ave, New York, NY 10016-4309, USA

originalText.text: I can’t recommend this math tutoring service enough! I was out of school for weeks due to medical leave and through only 2 sessions I was able to catch up with all of the material. Misha is very engaging and makes even the most complex concepts easy to understand and enjoyable to learn. He is also very patient with his students, creating a comfortable environment where asking questions is encouraged. If you’re looking for a tutor who is not only knowledgeable, but also engaging and passionate about teaching math, then look no further. My experience has been incredibly positive and I’ve seen significant improvement in my understanding of math concepts since starting sessions here!

originalText.text: Misha was teaching my child on both advanced math topics and competition math. They covered Modular Arithmetic, Counting Principles, Binomial Theorem during my child's middle school years. Misha was really helpful explaining proof writing to middle school students as well as helping them improve the AMC scores. I would recommend Misha for both advanced mathematics and competition Math training.

originalText.text: Misha tutored my daughter for math enrichment. I recommend him strongly as a math tutor! He is a patient and engaging teacher. Watching my daughter's sessions with him, I observed that he has a skill for explaining concepts in a clear way, and he was in tune with what concepts she was able to grasp or not, and he was flexible enough to be able to explain concepts from a different angle on the fly, when needed. He did a great job of helping guide my elementary school-aged daughter to work through math problems while drawing out and helping her access and strengthen her own natural abilities and problem-solving skills.

originalText.text: Misha gave math lessons to our son. He is knowledgeable, organized and effective in his teaching. He provides a great combination of rigorous training with a thoughtful, individualized approach. He balances getting through material efficiently, and cultivating a deep understanding.

originalText.text: I worked with Misha on AMC prep and math enrichment. We covered strategies to do better on AMC and some topics included polynomial factoring, logarithms, probability with coins and dice, rearrangements with restrictions, geometric probability, expected value, and so on. Misha was very knowledgeable and competent in all those topics. He is also very responsive via email. If you are looking for an effective tutor, Misha would be a great choice.
